name: Incognito Tab Mover
description: Move tabs from incognito to regular window. Use Alt+M (Option+M on Mac) to move current tab, or Alt+Shift+M (Option+Shift+M on Mac) to move all incognito tabs.
author: Rohit Wadhwa

move-tab.description: Move current tab to a non-incognito window

move-all-tabs.description: Move all incognito tabs to a non-incognito window
